strIntroduction: No.1 snorkelling choice in Okinawa Blue Cave! It is a very safe and suitable snorkelling option especially for non-swimmers and snorkelling beginners! All participants will be given a life jacket, as well as a coach that will be by your side to assist you. We also offer snorkelling equipment for children that are age 5 or above! During fish feeding time, all baits will also be provided! Make the most of it for your Okinawa trip!

strIntroduction: 1.中文导游陪同，冲绳经典路线5个景点定期观光巴士一日游。 2.冲绳必去游览的冲绳美丽海水族馆，还有精彩的海豚表演。 3.御果子御殿名护店的亚热带森林，以恐龙为主题的侏罗纪森林公园。 4. 3个不同的集合点，可以根据酒店的位置选择最近的集合点。
strTitle: 【中文导游】冲绳万座毛+水族馆+奥特莱斯+御果子御殿·亚热带森林+水果乐园观光巴士一日游
